grade_comment:
Grade: 95/100

Comments: This response does an excellent job in connecting the title "King of the Jews" to Old Testament prophecies, particularly referencing Micah 5:2 and the promise to King David in 2 Samuel 7:12-16 and Psalms. The student effectively demonstrates how the title fulfilled the prophecies of a messianic king from the line of David who would rule over Israel. The answer is well-supported and provides a clear explanation of the significance of Jesus being referred to as the "King of the Jews" in light of these prophecies. Great job!
